"Dark Blast Aura":
"By changing your settings, you can change how your Dark Blast appears when you use it.

The display type can be set separately for each form by selecting \"Change display type/colors\" in each form's menu and setting the display type to \"Aura type\"."

"You can also change how other players' Dark Blasts appear to you in these settings.

Select \"Dark Blast settings\" from basic settings. By setting \"Other players' Dark Blast display type\" to \"Always display as Aura type\", you can force other player's Dark Blasts to always appear as Dark Blast Auras."
